attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.review: genuinely upset. this app is a scam - you will continuously be spammed by numbers that don’t apply to trump’s campaign. texting STOP will not stop the influx of messages. i feel popular but at what cost? my imessage does not open anymore without crashing because of the spam messages. tired of this.

attributes.title: Hacked my phone
attributes.review: I had this app for probably 5 minutes to support the best President ever, but then my phone crashed. A bunch of Chinese symbols kept popping up on my phone and it kept shutting down. The communists are HACKING OUR PHONES! This app is dangerous and needs to be taken down and fixed IMMEDIATELY!!!

attributes.title: do not download !!
